enum eQCWWANError PkQmiDmsRestoreFactoryDefaults ( WORD *  pMlength,
BYTE *  pParamField,
CHAR *  pSPC 
)

This function packs the Get Model ID parameters to the QMI message SDU.

Parameters:
pParamField [OUT] - Pointer to storage into which the packed data will be placed by this function.
pMlength [OUT] - Total length of built message.
Returns:
eQCWWAN_ERR_NONE - Increment successful
eQCWWAN_ERR_NO_MEMORY - Accessed beyond allowed size attempted
See also:
qaGobiApiDms.h for remaining parameter descriptions.

struct QmiDmsRestoreFactoryDefaultsResp *  pApiResp 
)

This function unpacks the ResetToFactoryDefaults response message to a user-provided response structure.

Parameters:
pMdmResp - Pointer to packed response from the modem.
pApiResp - Pointer to storage to unpack into.
Returns:
eQCWWAN_ERR_NONE, on success
